Required Skills: End-to-end software development lifecycle (requirements, architectural design, coding, testing)
Unit testing, debugging, and anomaly correction
Participation in reviews (documents, designs, code, test cases, user documentation)
Work estimation, status reporting, and task prioritization
Agile/SAFe practices, including PI planning and sprint planning (user story breakdown, task estimation)
Collaboration within large, global project teams
Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent
Experience: Minimum 5 years in new product design of software or software systems, including large-scale enterprise system projects; plus at least 2 years participating in formal review processes (design reviews, code reviews)
